# `rbind2_giotto_polygon_homo`

Append giotto polygons of the same name


## Description

Append two giotto polygons together of the same name.
 Performed recursively through `rbind2` and `rbind`


## Usage

```r
rbind2_giotto_polygon_homo(x, y)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`x`     |     `giottoPolygon` 1
`y`     |     `giottoPolygon` 2
